column3: @ryanofsky you might want to check this over :)
Thanks for taking and rebasing this. Big concept ACK. Will review later.
Needs rebase, after that please let me know and we should just merge it, has had lots of review and is a pain to keep up to date.
Rebased and added missing tick pointed out by @promag, will just wait for travis to verify the scripted-diff again

Tested ACK 7b91b5f8a4417da1940956c1ab32dba94dc104e1.\n\nI noticed that there were a few `.rc` and `.mm` files still using the "" style includes. Should those also be changed to <> style? I think the change would be like this: https://github.com/jnewbery/bitcoin/commit/1a506c7ebf91747f40c9e408f8947e5491101422 but I don't have windows or mac machines to test the build on.

> I noticed that there were a few .rc and .mm files still using the "" style includes.\n\nIf they are correctly relative (so to include from the directory the including file is in, or even a directory relative to its directory) it's fine to keep them. `""` style includes are a problem when they're used when `<>` is meant, which was common in this project before this change.
BTW, unrelated but the `Rationale` above doesn't render well. And some are missing a period.
